author: dna webdesk
title: Watch: Massive fire at Crawford market in Mumbai; several shops gutted
text:
A massive fire broke out at a Crawford Market in Mumbai on Sunday morning.
At least 10 fire engines and eight water tanks have been rushed to the spot.
Chief fire officer PS Rahangdale said, "50 to 60 shops caught fire this morning. The entire situation is now under control. We doused flames within one hour."
"The reason of fire will be known after investigation," he added.
Massive fire at Crawford market in #Mumbai ; several shops gutted https://t.co/jTyQKOYMoI pic.twitter.com/b04N0Ydco1

More details awaited.
